publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-501# Patricia Ferguson: Urban Tourism—That the Parliament recognises the economic benefits tourism brings to Glasgow and other urban towns and cities, and the important role played by bodies such as the Greater Glasgow & Clyde Valley Tourist Board.

S1M-501# Patricia Ferguson: Urban Tourism—That the Parliament recognises the economic benefits tourism brings to Glasgow and other urban towns and cities, and the important role played by bodies such as the Greater Glasgow & Clyde Valley Tourist Board. Supported by: Pauline McNeill*
S1M-501# Urban Tourism (lodged on 3 February 2000) Rhoda Grant*, Robert Brown*
S1M-501# Urban Tourism (lodged on 3 February 2000) Johann Lamont*, Paul Martin*
S1M-501# Urban Tourism (lodged on 3 February 2000) Mr John McAllion*

S1M-501# Patricia Ferguson: Urban Tourism-That the Parliament recognises the economic benefits tourism brings to Glasgow and other urban towns and cities, and the important role played by bodies such as the Greater Glasgow & Clyde Valley Tourist Board. Supported by: Pauline McNeill, Rhoda Grant, Robert Brown, Johann Lamont, Paul Martin, Mr John McAllion
S1M-501# Urban Tourism (lodged on 3 February 2000) Donald Gorrie*

S1M-501# Patricia Ferguson: Urban Tourism—That the Parliament recognises the economic benefits tourism brings to Glasgow and other urban towns and cities, and the important role played by bodies such as the Greater Glasgow & Clyde Valley Tourist Board. Supported by: Pauline McNeill, Rhoda Grant, Robert Brown, Johann Lamont, Paul Martin, Mr John McAllion, Donald Gorrie
